lyrics.stanza: If we do not have the heart to take care of God's house for His satisfaction, No matter how much we eat or drink or how well we dress, There will be no satisfaction; if we neglect the church— Thus says Jehovah, Consider your ways. Go up to the mountain and bring wood, And build My house, and I'll take pleasure in it, And will be glorified.
